plan.name: Rail Security
plan.description: Information sharing for an IED attack on a public transit system.

medium.name: Seat drop
medium.description: Printed communiques put on passenger seats

organization.name: Metropolis Transit Authority
organization.mission: Provide safe and speedy transit to the citizens and visitors of Metropolis.

event.name: Attack suspected
event.description: Suspicious activity or baggage detected in a public transit system

event.name: Bomb threat
event.description: Intelligence agency has issued warning of a possible suicide bombing attack on the rail transit system.

segment.name: IED threat warning
segment.description: The IED attack warning is disseminated within the rail transit system.

flow.name: General safety and security alert bulletin

eoi.content: Blanket confirmation of counter-measures being taken

segment.name: Local response plan activated
segment.description: Train station or bus terminal executes its threat response plan

connector.segment-description: The IED attack warning is disseminated within the rail transit system.
The IED attack warning is disseminated within the rail transit system.
Train station or bus terminal executes its threat response plan
